location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant Robert Taylor, in charge at the Bushire Residency to the Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing bills (not present) on the Military Paymaster General for military disbursements at the Bushire Residency for September 1812, and on the Marine Paymaster for the salary of the Marine Agent, Stephen Watson Henshaw.
